snippet: For a lack of progress, 18 Division I teams will miss postseason play in 2013-14, but the Connecticut men’s basketball team has requalified.
abstract: Connecticut men's basketball team, barred from 2013 season because of past problems with its Academic Progress Rate, has qualified academically for next year's NCAA tournament.
lead_paragraph: For a lack of progress, 18 Division I teams will miss postseason play in 2013-14, but the Connecticut men’s basketball team has requalified.

headline.main: N.C.A.A. Hands Out Postseason Bans for Academics, but UConn Is Back
headline.print_headline: UConn Men Can Be in Postseason
